title: High-performance ultraviolet detector based on self-assembled 3D/2D perovskite heterostructure
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27323-27331
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05576D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Haiyan Wang, Mengxin Ning, Qiaohe Wang, Yachuan Liang, Sen Li, Zijiong Li, Lingli Wang, Yan Wang, Liying Jiang
Heterogeneous assembly of metal halide perovskites (MHPs) structures offers convenience for promoting the interfacial properties of perovskite heterojunctions, which have been widely used in the new generation of photoelectric devices.
